ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Looking for Wisdom Items, and Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: The undead in Kithcor forest too, the ones near the zone to Commons are not too high you could do them with full group of low to mid 30 s.  Zone if you get an
ygData.messageBody:
The undead in Kithcor forest too, the ones near the zone to Commons are not too high you could do them with full group of low to mid 30's.  Zone if you get an Enraged Dread Wolf, mean sob's.  But it seems that the mace from the undead healers (the +wisdom one) drops a lot more now.  Although I think the one Mr. Rhodes speaks of is better stat wise. So I dont know why I typed any of this.  To summarize, if you want to waste time getting a inferior weapon with a longer camp time.  Go to Kithcor forest, otherwise go to Great Divide.  lol
 
Mu
 
Although we did get 2 Kedge and 3 Ishvas in 3 nights (game nights) the other day (actually almost a month ago since its been that long since I played).  Also got a 8/22 1hs Effect Yk (Scimitar).
 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]
Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 1:37 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Looking for Wisdom Items, and Weapon

Go to GD and try to get Yaka's mace. (I forget it's proper name) He's a named Tizmak who spawns a couple times a day in the cliffs above the waterfall. Should be able to take him in a group.
----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Rhodes
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com ; EQ-Trade@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:14 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Looking for Wisdom Items, and Weapon

Hello Everyone,

I'm a Druid on the Nameless Server and I am in the market for Wisdom items,
and a better weapon then the Screaming Mace..
I am lvl 30 right now, soon to be 31...

Thanks everyone...

Kyena
